search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for Splitwise (splitwise.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: Here is the official URL to the pricing page for Splitwise: [https://secure.splitwise.com/pro](https://secure.splitwise.com/pro)【3:0†source】.

extracted_content.content:
![Image 1](https://assets.splitwise.com/assets/pro/unlimited-expenses-417e3736c5e7fcb89941dacd9000f10c2cc16bd0b22ea12d7f9b9790a05b6e0a.png)

Unlimited expenses
------------------

Add as many expenses as you like each day, with no interruptions. Stay on top of your spending and stay in the moment with your friends.

![Image 2](https://assets.splitwise.com/assets/pro/transaction-import-4f0eff6f1843859cf816630e47d0611d33a620ade9d734549663df2cdcb6877d.png)

Transaction import
------------------

Connect a credit or debit card to see your recent purchases — then split with just a tap. (Currently available only in the US.)

![Image 3](https://assets.splitwise.com/assets/pro/currency-conversion-fd457aec82b5e6e71b46beca2713922a52008dc8d5822dd256652600b78eadbc.png)

Currency conversion
-------------------

Going abroad? Splitwise can convert all your bills to any currency you'd like, using today's foreign exchange rates.

![Image 4](https://assets.splitwise.com/assets/pro/charts-56ae64f2fa1f1afc5e94ef5211c25c1073b231e8091f19948ca8e6ffe3df2505.png)

Charts and graphs
-----------------

Keep your budget on track, at home or on a trip. We break down your spending by category and show you trends over time, so you can identify excessive spending and save money.

![Image 5](https://assets.splitwise.com/assets/pro/receipt-scanning-9150c3ea3b246ea6d9639a0977c7d812f219d67a7d502bcb96087409dc665205.png)

Receipt scanning
----------------

Add complicated bills to Splitwise with ease! Just take a picture of your receipt, and Splitwise will automatically scan its contents.

![Image 6](https://assets.splitwise.com/assets/pro/itemization-9c11e7e6eb564593e222da05de9bd1066b4d5caa9c8e77c5a24e42c7011e0d5b.png)

Itemization
-----------

After scanning a receipt, Splitwise will detect the individual items so that you can assign them to your friends. Perfect for splitting restaurant and grocery bills.

![Image 7](https://assets.splitwise.com/assets/pro/expense-search-e7feba0854b83903376c6402d00bbd9f6723f694324918a139029c233cb62e93.png)

Expense search
--------------

Make sure you've entered everything correctly. Our search feature will help you locate old bills so you can double-check and edit them as needed.

![Image 8](https://assets.splitwise.com/assets/pro/split-settings-f069e8abf48236b921d33b3161dc3e29fedecedbb1fc48824821c32e125e34c0.png)

Default split settings
----------------------

Want to split all expenses with your partner 55%/45%? Travelling with multiple families and want to assign each family a certain number of shares? Create a group default split so you can set it and forget it.

Get even more with PRO
----------------------

Get even more organized with receipt scanning, charts and graphs, currency conversion, and more!

[Get Splitwise Pro!](https://secure.splitwise.com/pro/subscribe)

Splitwise is a free tool for friends and roommates to track bills and other shared expenses, so that everyone gets paid back. On the web, iPhone, and Android!

pricing_data.pricing_notes: Splitwise offers a free tier with basic features and a Pro subscription for advanced features.

pricing_tiers.tier_description: Basic features for tracking shared expenses.
Advanced features for enhanced expense management.

![Image 1](https://assets.splitwise.com/assets/pro/unlimited-expenses-417e3736c5e7fcb89941dacd9000f10c2cc16bd0b22ea12d7f9b9790a05b6e0a.png)
